feed.title: Honey Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Honey: v2.1.1-stable
entry.content:
:memo: Release notes

:new: Changes

  • Rebrand Settings to More
  • HTTPS <-> Independence ratio can be now set in config.json
  • Theme icon on main page is now animated!
  • Optimize fonts - app is now 65% lighter!
  • Force fire all Settings events on load to prevent UI glitches

:hammer_and_wrench: Development

  • Some code cleanups and reorganization
  • Remove unused asset (appicon.png)

entry.title: New release for Honey: v2.1.2-stable
entry.content:
:memo: Release notes

:new: Changes

  • :tada: Like a full Docker support? :tada:
  • Removed %% for Privacy tab summary

:hammer_and_wrench: Development

  • Configured GitHub Actions for auto-pushing new Docker image on each release

entry.title: New release for Honey: v2.2.0-stable
entry.content:
:memo: Release notes

:new: Changes

  • Rename Privacy to Overview
  • Replace privacy report with services count
  • Various privacy boxes improvements
  • Minor UI improvements

:hammer_and_wrench: Development

  • Many code cleanups & refactors
  • Dropped unused asset

entry.title: New release for Honey: v2.2.1-stable
entry.content:
:memo: Release notes

:new: Changes

  • Progressive Web App support
  • Hide scrollbar on Firefox

:hammer_and_wrench: Development

No major changes

entry.title: New release for Honey: v2.2.2-stable
entry.content:
:memo: Release notes

:new: Changes

  • Fix broken Progressive Web App support
